name: Deja Vu (Wyfried)
description:
This game was made for the second BenBonk 72 hour game jam!

Theme: Limited Space

Controls:

A and D for movement

Space to jump

More Info:

This was my first game jam and one of my first original games! I hope you enjoy it! I plan to keep competing in jams so keep an eye out for future projects. All art and music were created by me and I wrote the code myself with help from channels such as Brackeys. Deja Vu features only one level, however the parts of this level have been broken up to create many levels as you try and remember what your world looked like. Thanks again for playing!
